direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods subscribe to a product but for different types (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods handle product subscriptions and redemptions with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods access and manipulate flexible product data.
Both methods modify the subscription state of flexible products.

enhanced_by.reason: Requires access to the list of flexible products to set up the subscription.
Should be invoked to check the current position before subscribing.
Can be used to verify the subscription record after the subscription.
